embed.title: Bot Information
embed.description: I am a Discord Interactions bot with utility features, written in Python and hosted on Deta Space.

fields.name: Host your own copy with Deta Space:
Create your own bot:
fields.value: Install the [library on pypi](https://pypi.org/project/deta-discord-interactions/) or check out the [GitHub page](https://github.com/etrotta/deta-discord-interactions)
